product_name: Columbia Super Bonehead Classic Shirt - Men's Tall - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Designed to meet the needs of active hikers and fishermen, the men's tall-size Columbia Super Bonehead Classic Shirt is made of lightweight cotton with UPF 30 sun protection. 100% cotton poplin shirt keeps you cool and protected from harmful UV rays, whether playing on the water or hiking ridgelines. Angler-specific features include 4 fly-box pockets, a rod holder loop and a utility loop. Mesh-lined vents at back shoulder increase airflow. Columbia Bonehead Classic Shirt in men's tall sizes also features a button-down collar. Closeout.
short_description: Designed to meet the needs of active hikers and fishermen, the men's tall-size Columbia Super Bonehead Classic Shirt is made of lightweight cotton with UPF 30 sun protection.
